name: KeyCap Fight
description:
A two local players fighting game!

Player 1 Instructions:

  • Move: WSAD
  • Dash: Left Control

Player 2 Instructions:

  • Move: Arrow keys
  • Dash: Right Control

Knock off your opponent's keycaps.

Get back your lost keycaps.

Pick coins to get high score in 60 sec.

Lost key caps will try to get back to you.

Credit:

SFX & Font:  https://kenney.itch.io

SFX: https://beepyeah.itch.io/8-bit-sfx-pack

Special thanks to Cony and Qiang
